questions.text: Which practice best exemplifies segregation of duties?

options.A: One person handles receiving, recording, and reconciling
options.B: Different people handle cash, recording, approval, and reconciliation

questions.explanation: Splitting duties reduces error and fraud risk.

questions.text: Why require a fidelity bond for staff handling funds?

options.C: To insure against losses from employee dishonesty

questions.explanation: Fidelity bonds insure the organization against specific risks.

questions.text: If litigation is expected, what happens to relevant records?

options.C: Place a legal hold and preserve until resolution

questions.explanation: Legal holds pause normal retention until resolution.
